title: Collaborative Curriculum Redesign to Strengthen Digital Literacy Competencies for Early Childhood Education

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Emphasizing Design Competencies for Digital Literacy Education for Young Children Linked to Science Integrated Learning

learning_goals: Learners can collaboratively design digital literacy education activities suitable for early childhood development.
Learners can develop at least three educational scenarios integrating science with digital tool utilization.
Collaborate with P-5 educational field experts to submit curriculum improvement proposals
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
